widget.label: Forgot Password
widget.tooltip: You forgot your password and still want to use our site. Enter your email address and click Send. You'll receive an email with a link that will allow you to change your password.
widget.help: After registration we ensure you entered a valid email address by asking you to enter a verification code. This form allows you to enter that verification code. Once verified, you can log in your account and start using our website as a registered user.

widget.label: Email
widget.tooltip: Enter the exact same email as your used to register on our website then click Send to receive a new verification code in your mailbox.
widget.help: Enter the email address you used to register your account on our website.

widget.label: Send
widget.tooltip: Once you entered your email address click here to process the form.
widget.help: Please enter your email address in the box so named and then click on the Send button.

widget.label: Log In
widget.help: Just remembered your password? Click here to go to the log in form instead.

widget.label: Verify Password
widget.tooltip: Click here to verify a password change request
widget.help: You forgot your password and requested a token to enter a new password? We sent you an email with a code in it. You can enter the code in the Verify Password form.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the home page
widget.help: Changed your mind? Click on this Cancel link to return to the home page.
